doc.after: Music and dance are an integral part of Cameroonian ceremonies festivals social gatherings and storytelling 133 134 Traditional dances are highly choreographed and separate men and women or forbid participation by one sex altogether 135 The goals of dances range from pure entertainment to religious devotion 134 Traditionally music is transmitted orally In a typical performance a chorus of singers echoes a soloist 136
